edu.illinois.mitra.starl.comms

Class SmartCommsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.comms.SmartCommsHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SmartCommsHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
    Implements the simple acknowledgment protocol (SAP) in an efficient manner. No spinning threads are left running.
    See Also:
    RobotMessage, SmartComThread

    • Method Detail

      • addOutgoing

        public void addOutgoing(RobotMessage msg,
                        MessageResult result,
                        int retries)
        Add an outgoing message. Messages are sent as soon as the SmartComThread is available. This function blocks until the message has been sent.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to send
        result - the MessageResult object to update with the results of the send
        retries - the maximum number of retransmissions before a message is considered lost

      • handleReceived

        public void handleReceived(UdpMessage msg)
        Handles a received message. This is only to be called from the SmartCommsHandler to which this is linked!
        Parameters:
        msg - the received UDPMessage
